epd_metadata.comparability: EPDs within the same product category but from different programmes may not be comparable. For comparability, EPDs must be based on the same PCR version, cover products with identical functions, technical performance and use, have equivalent system limits and data descriptions, apply equivalent data quality requirements, data collection and allocation methods, identical cut-off rules and impact assessment methods, and be valid at the time of comparison.

product_description.product_group_classification: UN CPC 3744: Portland cement, aluminous cement, slag cement and similar hydraulic cements, except in the form of clinkers
product_description.declared_unit: One ton (1,000 kg) of product ready to be sent to the customer
product_description.packaging: Product is marketed in bulk; no packaging materials
product_description.hazardous_substances: No hazardous substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern (SVHC) used in percentage higher than 0.1% of product weight

lca_information.declared_unit: One ton (1,000 kg) of ECOPlanet CEM II/B-M (S-L) 42.5 R
lca_information.system_boundary: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) including quarry works, component manufacturing, transport of materials and fuels, factory process and final preparation; excludes modules B1 to D due to product integration and transformation at end of life and no biogenic carbon
lca_information.data_quality: High; data representative of declared geography, recent, third-party verified direct emissions included in PRTR and EU Emissions Trade System
lca_information.cut_off_rules: At least 95% of total input flows (mass and energy) per module included; expanded cut-off rule of ISO 21930 applied
lca_information.allocation: Only used for verified direct emissions of furnace where clinker is used for different cements
excluded_processes: Manufacture of equipment, buildings, capital goods
Transport of people to and inside manufacturing plants

electricity_mix.source: Supplier specific, demonstrated by guarantee of origin

impact_assessment_methods.Acidification: Accumulated Exceedance (Seppälä et al 2006, Posch et al 2008)
impact_assessment_methods.Eutrophication_terrestrial: Accumulated Exceedance (Seppälä et al 2006, Posch et al 2008)
impact_assessment_methods.Depletion_abiotic_resources_elements: CML 2002 (Guinée et al. 2002) and van Oers et al. 2002
impact_assessment_methods.Depletion_abiotic_resources_fossil_fuels: CML 2002 (Guinée et al. 2002) and van Oers et al. 2002

transport_and_installation.transport_included: Yes, transport of raw materials and fuels by ship and truck included (A2 module)
transport_and_installation.transport_data_source: Distances by road and sea provided by each factory based on own records
transport_and_installation.installation: Not applicable; product physically integrated and cannot be separated at end of life

end_of_life.boundary: Excluded (modules B1 to D) because product is physically integrated during installation and undergoes physical-chemical transformation, no longer identifiable at end of life
end_of_life.biogenic_carbon: Product does not contain biogenic carbon

additional_GWP_GHG.note: Includes all greenhouse gases except biogenic carbon dioxide uptake and emissions and biogenic carbon stored in product

company_information.address: Avda. de Manoteras, 29, Edificio B, 1° Planta - 28050 Madrid, Spain
company_information.description: Holcim España owns five cement factories in Spain with over seven million tons per year capacity, more than 20 concrete plants, two mortar plants, six terminals, and one waste recovery plant, employing over 700 people. It has R&D and quality laboratories and is part of Holcim, a global leader in sustainable construction solutions.
company_information.sustainability_practices: Decarbonizing operations via recycling materials as alternative fuels, offering low-carbon products, working towards net zero built environment, protecting water and biodiversity.
certifications: Included in Spanish Carbon Footprint National Registry with 'Calculo' and 'Reduzco' labels
